alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Macon; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:59AM CDT until June 29 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Piatt County in central Illinois... Southeastern De Witt County in central Illinois... Northeastern Macon County in central Illinois... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 559 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weldon, or 9 miles west of Monticello, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... De Land around 605 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Monticello, Bement and White Heath. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 150 and 173. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
